page.title: 02Housing, Uppingham, Rutland
page.content: It is proposed to build 44 houses on the Old Mill Site,Ayston Road, Uppingham, just within the southern boundary of the project area.It is thought that this site had previously been bought for Â£190,000 which was about Â£80,000 per acre _a local record.The Rutland and Stamford Mercury of 26 April 1985 reported a special planning committee meeting about the site under the heading { {Building Density is too high.}Concern was reported about the density of houses , the filling in of the adjacent brook,the future maintainance of the area, and other environmental factors. Building of 42 houses was finally agreed in July 1985, as reported in the Rutland and Stamford Mercury of 12 July 1985.
